EquipmentHats46.desc: This is the ACTUAL strawberry from the Buddhist story about the Tiger and the Strawberry. No wonder the dangling man thought it so tasty!

EquipmentHats47.desc: 'Ew cringe.' Said the teenager, in a selfish attempt to diminish the joy others experience from something so they can feel better about not liking it.

EquipmentHats48.desc: It's like getting pied, but instead of pie it's ice cream and instead of a basketball and a hoop its this ice cream and your head.

Ht.desc: Turns any normal hat into a premium hat! Buy this if you have a really cool hat with bad stats, so you can wear that while also wearing a different hat with good stats! NOTE:This will erase all stats, and give it +1 All Stat and 5 Premium Upgrade Slots.

EquipmentHats49.desc: Oh this? Why, this is only the PEAK fashion statement in all of IdleOn! Influenced by trends of the late 2000s, its back and hotter than ever!

EquipmentHats50.desc: Lets be honest... this is just the Bored Beanie but less cool

EquipmentHats35.desc: Definitely the coolest hat in the game, lets be real. That's why it's also the most expensive!

EquipmentHats38.desc: This hat is invisible, and your normal hat will show up instead. Buy this hat if you want to use some Premium Upgrade Stones, while still seeing your normal hat!

Timecandy1.desc: Gives you a single 1 Hour Candy. Also, you're not a real adventurer in Flapjack's eyes. Sorry, just tellin' ya like it is!

Timecandy2.desc: Gives a random Time Candy. The chances are: 34% for 1 Hr, 33% for 2 Hr, and 33% for 4 Hr.

Timecandy3.desc: Gives a random Time Candy. The chances are: 50% for 2 Hr, 25% for 4 Hr, 18% for 12 Hr, and 7% for 24 Hr.

Timecandy4.desc: Gives a random Time Candy. The chances are: 33% for 4 Hr, 40% for 12 Hr, 22% for 24 Hr, and 4% for 72 Hr.

InvBag21.desc: Gives +4 extra Item Slots for your backpack. Applies to all your characters, even ones you haven't made yet!

InvStorage31.desc: Gives +6 extra Storage Chest Slots. Storage Chests are found in each town, and the items you put in can be access by all your players!

GemP2.desc: Each purchase boosts the carry capacity by +25% for all your characters. This starts working immediately, and applies to every item type!

GemP8.desc: Gives +1 extra food slot for all characters, forever! Dont worry, 4 food slots will be added FOR FREE in game in later updates, scattered across the game!

Pdaily0.desc: Each purchase gives +7 daily teleports every day, forever. You can use these on the Map Screen. You can be gone for up to 4 days and claim them all upon your return!

Pdaily1.desc: Each purchase gives you +4 additional Daily Minigame Plays across your account. These dont stack from day to day, else youd be swimmin' in them!

ResetCompleted.desc: Resets all your talents to Lv 0, and fully refunds all talent points. This does NOT reset any of the                     Star Tab talents.                  This item restocks each week.

ResetCompletedS.desc: Resets all the talents in the Star Tab to Lv 0, and fully refunds all talent points. This does NOT reset other talents, only ones in the Star Tab. This item restocks each week.

ClassSwap.desc: Lets you swap subclass, like going from Barbarian to Squire. HOWEVER, you CANT change between main classes, like going from a Warrior to an Archer. You can only buy 2 every major update.

ResetBox.desc: Resets all your post office upgrades, and            refunds all boxes spent. This lets you choose          different post office box upgrades!            This item restocks each week.

GemP3.desc: Lets you equip another card, so you can have more card bonuses! This applies to all characters.

CardPack1.desc: Contains 3 cards from any set in the game, other than world 3 because it's not out yet. Has a 15% chance to give at least one Boss Card. Card Lv Rarities are: 50% for Lv 1, 35% for Lv 2, and 15% for Lv 3.

CardPack2.desc: Contains 4 cards from any set in the game, other than world 3 because it's not out yet. Has a 40% chance to give at least one Boss Card. Card Lv Rarities are: 26% for Lv 1, 30% for Lv 2, 27% for Lv 3, and 17% for Lv 4.

GemQ9.desc: Lets you swap between different card loadouts with ease! No more manually swapping cards around when doing different things! Each purchase gives +1 preset for ALL characters!

StonePremSTR.desc: Gives +5 STR to the applied item, and has a 100% Success Rate. Can ONLY be used on Premium Equipment bought in the Gem Shop!

StonePremAGI.desc: Gives +5 AGI to the applied item, and has a 100% Success Rate. Can ONLY be used on Premium Equipment bought in the Gem Shop!

StonePremWIS.desc: Gives +5 WIS to the applied item, and has a 100% Success Rate. Can ONLY be used on Premium Equipment bought in the Gem Shop!

StonePremLUK.desc: Gives +5 LUK to the applied item, and has a 100% Success Rate. Can ONLY be used on Premium Equipment bought in the Gem Shop!

StonePremRestore.desc: Use this on a premium hat to refund all Premium Stones used on it, and reset the hat back to starting stats. No, this does not reset upgrades on regular items lol

GemP1.desc: Lets you produce TWO anvil items at once! Applies to all characters you make. Stacks with other bonuses that give +1 anvil hammer.

GemP6.desc: Can assign +2 extra players to this cauldron. Also has 1.5x faster brewing, and 1.5x higher new bubble chance.

GemP7.desc: Can assign +1 extra player to this cauldron. Also has 1.5x higher Liquid Cap, and 1.5x faster liquid regeneration rate. Unlike the Bubble Cauldrons, you have to buy these in order.

GemP5.desc: Every purchase gives +4 Circle Slots. Every 2nd purchase gives +4 Square Slots. Every 3rd purchase gives +4 Hexagon and +4 Sparkle Slots. So buying this 4 times would give +16 Circles, +8 square, and +4 Hexagon and Sparkle

GemP9.desc: Gives 3 random obols. Each obol has a 70% chance to be Silver, and 30% chance to be gold. Guaranteed at least 1 Gold obol per stack!

GemP10.desc: Gives 3 random obols. Each obol has 65% chance to be Gold, 25% chance to be Platinum, and 10% chance to be Dementia rarity. Guaranteed at least 1 Platinum or Dementia Obol per stack!

GemQ1.desc: Unlocks the 2nd printer chamber to print stuff in, for ALL characters you ever make, forever. This lets you print two things at once, it can even be the same thing twice!

GemQ2.desc: Unlocks +1 space to take samples in. These are the tiny blue squares. Buy this if you want to juggle between different samples without having to retake them all the time.

GemQ3.desc: Raises the minimum level of books from the Talent Book Library by +5. This means it's more likely for you to get the highest possible level books!

GemQ4.desc: Lets you equip +1 more Prayer at the same time, on all characters!

GemQ5.desc: These premium cogs are the best in the game! Yin Cogs have the best base stats! Yang Cogs have the best Surround Effects! Each purchase gives 1 of each!

GemQ6.desc: Each purchase gives you +4 cog inventory spaces, to store all your cogs in!

GemQ7.desc: Unlocks +1 more slot to build towers in! Remember, each slot builds at your FULL build rate, so this upgrade helps massively to upgrade all your towers to max level!

GemQ8.desc: Makes your flaggies unlock spaces faster, opening up your board for more cogs! Each purchase boosts Flaggy rate by +50%
